myProjects.name: Affiliate Sites
myProjects.description: High profitable affiliate websites. Focused on specific product niche. Content is formed by comparing tables and lots of long product reviews. It is based on Wordpress but design is mostly styled by own css. There is a height level of SEO and linkbuilding used to get visitors from SERP.

myProjects.description: Eshop with wallpapers, mostly bespoke products. Eshop is based on rent eshop-rychle platform but there is lots of own design modification via css. Project focuses on high quality SEO + linkbuilding and visitors from SERP.
